Values: Guanjun Xiao, Ye Cao, Guangyu Qi, Lingrui Wang, Chuang Liu, Zhiwei Ma, Xinyi Yang, Yongming Sui, Weitao Zheng, and Bo Zou
Journal of the American Chemical Society
Yes, the Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/jacs.7b05260.

1. Fourier transform infrared (FTIR) spectroscopy
2. Photoluminescence (PL) spectroscopy
3. High-pressure photoluminescence (PL) measurement
4. Time-resolved photoluminescence (TRPL) decay dynamics
5. Absorption spectroscopy
6. Angle-dispersive X-ray diffraction (ADXRD)
The major application of the material mentioned in this article, cesium lead bromide nanocrystals (CsPbBr3NCs), is in optoelectronic devices and solar cells. Photocatalysis is not mentioned.
